channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Dancer/The Ballerina
channel.description:
> # [color=steblue]The Dancer[/color] > **[color=steblue]Blue DragonSupport[/color]** > > **Passive (Dancing Shoes)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. Will keep this Passive even if you class changes. > > **Day Ability (Dance Lessons)** - You will be immune to all attacks tonight.(2 Uses) > > **Night Ability (Teaching Dance Lessons)** - All attacks to target player shall be prevented. Instead all visits to you shall also be done to your target player as well.(Infinite Uses ~ See **Mechanics**) > **Goal:** *Defeat [color=purple]The Unseen[/color]/[color=darkred]The Cult[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek to do you harm.*
> # [color=purple]The Ballerina[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen Offensive[/color]** > >**Passive (Dancing Shoes)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. You will keep this passive even if your class changes. > >**Day Ability (Dance Lessons)** - You shall be immune to all attacks tonight.(2 Uses) > >**Night Ability (Teaching Dance Lessons)** - Targeted player's abilities will fail tonight. It will look like it's "Prevented".(Unlimited Uses - It's not occupation , pseduo prevention.) >**Night Ability (Redirected Dance)** - Targeted player will believe they were redirected to this player when they weren’t.(3 Uses - No ability gets prevented , they get a message like "You were forced to Investigative X" - Bypasses Redirection Immunity) >**Goal:** *Defeat [color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek to do you harm.*
> # Mechanics > The most useful ability in The Dancer's kit is "Teaching Dance Lessons". So this will be dedicated to explain how that works. The most important thing is that : "Negative & Positive effect go to the Dancer and the Target" > **Situation 1** - Let's say a Princess/Sheriff/Pally/Observer investigates/follows you. They will instead get your target's results without them knowing you redirected them to him/her. (This is why this Bypasses Redirection Immunity. ~ Works on all Investigative Abilities - Doesn't tell them they were "Redirected") > **Situation 2** - You're basically a knight. You prevent attacks and don't die when you successfully do so. So if you get healed , you make a healing circle(of 2 people) with the person you selected. > **Situation 3** - If you get attacked and die as The Dancer when you've selected someone , your target dies as well. > **Situation 4** - Ahh , conversions! If The Mastermind/The Cult Leader tries to convert you or your target , you will get converted instead.(Doesn't matter if there are still spaces for conversions.) > **Situation 5** - The Good Ol' Might Possessor! When using "Puppet String" , both The Dancer and their target will visit the second target the the Possessor Selected. If you decide to "Possess" either The Dancer or their target , The Possessor will jump into The Dancer's body and will kill the target. > **Situation 6** - The Circle of Death now will kill all players visiting either The Dancer or their Target. > **Situation 7** - Reaper game! Now you may think : "What can I do to prevent my target from dying?" Stack up on "Dance Lessons" or The Reaper will Reap 2 players! (Reap will count as a Negative Effect)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Dancer/The Ballerina
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It needs to specify that 2 target Ability’s, conversions and possessions don’t count and that it only duplicates the EFFECTS of visits and not the visits themselves (so not social or Investigative ability’s).

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Dancer/The Ballerina
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Another BD Support that can protect him/herself? Ehhh

I also really don’t like the idea of more swaps as well.
It’d probably be better if it redirected all visitors to you? And if you use Dance Lessons, then you’ll become immune to attacks redirected that night but that’s about it. Not to mention that it’s sorta confirmable like a drunk is.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Dancer/The Ballerina
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
A is the CW first target. (you the dancer)
B is the CW second target (random dude)
All people targeting You and your target (AKA A) will instead target B. Anyone targeting B will instead be forced to target A and your target.
